name: bharatstatescitiesapi
description: "BharatStatesCitiesAPI is a RESTful API that provides comprehensive information about states and cities in India. Easily access a curated list of Indian states and their respective cities, making it a valuable resource for applications requiring location-based data within the Indian subcontinent. Simplify your development process with BharatStatesCitiesAPI, designed to streamline geographical data retrieval and enhance location-based services."
author: ashokwebworks
